body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Rhoda Jesse Nichols in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on March 31, 1830. Father of Veressa E. Nichols, Martha E. Nichols Earley, William M. Nichols, and John B. Nichols. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.
